item.description: HAPPY HOUR TIME WITH THE IRA FOR SINGLES!!!! NEW LOW PRICE: Only $8.00 !!! THE PARTY CONTINUES .NEW BEAUTIFUL VENUE. A RELAXING VIEW. COME AND UNWIND. EAT, DRINK, AND BE MERRY, PLUS, MEET SO MANY NEW MAN AND WOMAN……. WHEN: May 28 2009 THURSDAY WHERE: VITO’S BY THE PARK 26 Trumbull Street Hartford, CT 06103 Tel.: (860) 244-2200 DETAILS ABOUT THE FOOD: DELCIOUS HOT AND COLD FANTASTIC FOOD, PLUS MOUTH WATERING PIZZA WILL BE SERVED FROM 5:00- 7:00PM. COST FOR THE ABOVE PER PERSON; $ 8.00!!!!!! DETAILS ABOUT THE BAR: CASH BAR. HAPPY HOUR BAR PRICES FROM 5:00- 7:00PM. (Individual Bar Tabs) MARTINNIS- $5.00…..BEER AND WINE $3.00. MIXED DRINKS $5.00. (Prices are for House Specials) UPDATED NEWS BELOW Organized Happy Hours by The IRA have been a tremendous success. All that attend enjoy themselves with food, beverages, and most importantly, MINGLING AT IT’S VERY BEST. Name Tags, Fun Mingling Activities, and personal introduction to each person that attends, assures even the most quiet/shy person of meeting everyone there!!!! See all the Singles having fun at: http://www.meetup.com/West-Hartford-FUN-BUNCH/photos/585553/#8082297 , and http://www.meetup.com/West-Hartford-FUN-BUNCH/photos/613943/8642572/#8642572 AND MORE NEWS: A. We now have an Exclusive Area. Depending on the number of singles, a “Special Area” will be just for us. Don’t miss out on the FUN!!! AND The Entertainment of THE IRA One of our many Single Mingling Activities: Let’s Break the Ice…. A New Tradition: The Meet and Greet Single Line. A 30 Second Introduction!!! Starts at 6:00PM…… Don’t miss out on this wonderful way to meet people!!!!!! Please- RSVP No Later than May 27 at 9:00AM, so the restaurant can determine how much delicious food to prepare. Ira Wettenstein- 860-604-5792- mistrchrming@aol.com --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Happy Hour with The Ira. The Party Continues . New Venue. New Lower Price!!
